oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Group of Tennessee delegates to Grand Army of the Republic (GAR) reunion
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Group of Tennessee delegates to a GAR gathering in Boston, Massachusetts. Samuel Wallace Duncan, Co. M, 7th Penn. Vol. Cav. Regt., USA, is pictured standing, in the rear, second from the left. An unidentified African American man is seated; in the center of the group, holding the pennant. Duncan moved to Chattanooga after the war and became a city alderman in the 1890s. The GAR met in Boston in 1871, 1890, 1904, 1917, and 1924.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Duncan, Samuel Wallace
